title: TaskUpdateEvent
description: Schema for events related to updates originating from background services (e.g., recurring task instance creation).

originalTaskId.description: The ID of the original recurring task.

newTaskId.description: The ID of the newly created task instance.

userId.description: The unique identifier of the user who owns the task.

title.description: Title of the new task instance.

dueDate.description: Due date of the new task instance in ISO 8601 format.
